Articles.Content: Looks amazing. Downloading this now for my new career. This will fun to use the [Civilian Population](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/101058-10x-civilian-population-14/) mod with this.

> 
> 
> On 1/31/2016 at 4:22 AM, Pkmniako said:
> 
> 
> I've a new body for the new system done.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> [![TcbOLjE.png](http://i.imgur.com/TcbOLjE.png)](http://i.imgur.com/TcbOLjE.png "Enlarge image")
> 

That looks really nice! But is it a moon or a planet? I didn't see anything like this in the new system concept art. Also, what's its name?

**Edited <time datetime="2016-02-05T16:51:14Z" title="02/05/2016 04:51  PM" data-short="8 yr">February 5, 2016</time> by ProtoJeb21**

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, ProtoJeb21 said:
> 
> 
> That looks really nice! But is it a moon or a planet? I didn't see anything like this in the new system concept art. Also, what's its name?
> 

Edemynag, and orbits the Ice giant or planet 3 (For now on A3)

It's a selena with aproximated half the diameter of Kerbin.
The Bianary Planets for some reason are inside of star.....Help

I'll upload it also to Spacedock.
Re-uploaded it to github!
[@Pkmniako](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/138569-pkmniako/) Development update?

Uploaded to SpacePort!

> 
> 
> On 23/2/2016 at 0:00 AM, ProtoJeb21 said:
> 
> 
> [@Pkmniako](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/138569-pkmniako/) Development update?
> 

Working on atmosphere planets. They are a little buggy, so I need to fix things.  

But hey, at least I can give you a screenshot!  
![bbc1d97bef9ea9e0c0e275b030591663.png](https://i.gyazo.com/bbc1d97bef9ea9e0c0e275b030591663.png)

This is an awesome mod! However, I'm playing career mode and I haven't sent a manned mission to Duna yet, but I'm getting contracts asking me to go to Cercani. Also, the game is thinking Cercani is a planet, and its planets are moons.

Those are just little nitpicks though, I love this mod.
Can someone provide a download link for this mod, spaceport is broken and unusable. Otherwise I have no idea on how to install this specific mod.
Have anyone tried this mod with 1.1?

> 
> 
> 14 hours ago, TAImatem said:
> 
> 
> Have anyone tried this mod with 1.1?
> 

The mod's version is linked to Kopernicus's version (I think), and since Kopernicus was updated to 1.1, in theory the mod should work.

And you know, what prevents you from testing it yourself? Just make a test savefile and install the mod !

So... I've had some problems... I've lost the progress I had in the n2 system (Not the textures). But I'm deciding to make a little system, so I can be more prepared for n2 (Now n3?)  

Regarding to Cercani's system working on 1.1, it should work (although the rings could be again with different sizes)

So I tried it out on 1.1 with a new save file and when the game starts, instead of seeing the KSC, I just see a completely black screen. Don't even have the new sidebar on the left that lets you select the facilities. So looks like it's not quite working on 1.1 yet.

> 
> 
> On 23/4/2016 at 9:29 PM, Valectar said:
> 
> 
> So I tried it out on 1.1 with a new save file and when the game starts, instead of seeing the KSC, I just see a completely black screen. Don't even have the new sidebar on the left that lets you select the facilities. So looks like it's not quite working on 1.1 yet.
> 

For me it's working perfectly. Make sure you are using the lastest version of Kopernicus mod and Module Manager.  

I'm also removing the Custom Asteroids mod compatibility as its now implemented in Kopernicus

Hello [@Pkmniako](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/138569-pkmniako/)

First of all, sorry for my bad english im French haha.

Secondly, thanks to you for your amazing work, i love the Cercani System and that make me play more hours on KSP !

You said your mod works well in 1.1, but i have the same problem of Valectar. I have the last version of Module manager and Kopernicus too.

Any solutions ? Because for be honest, i dont want start a new game without ur mod ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif ";)")

Best regards from France

Xaeterza

That's really unfortunate to hear. Regardless, I look forward to anything you put out. One of the best (and only!) exoplanet mods out there, imo.

So I'm going to cut corners and cross post an error report I made in the Modular Flight Integrator thread [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/106369-112-modularflightintegrator-114-may-14th/&do=findComment&comment=2582343) that may or  may not be of interest.

Basically, while in Map View, I focused viewed every planet in the game, and every planet pertaining to your pack caused ModularFlightIntegrator to throw a wall of NRE's (see below, log [here](https://www.dropbox.com/s/gaa3sg49yuwwvdj/Player%20%28MFI%29.log?dl=0)). My guess is, it's the issue of the second Sun, and the NRE's disappear as soon as I switch back to a planet that orbits Sol.

This is on Linux x64 with v1.1.13 for KSP 1.1.12.

Cheers.

    NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object
      at FlightIntegrator.CalculateSunBodyFlux () [0x00000] in :0 
      at ModularFI.ModularFlightIntegrator.CalculateSunBodyFlux () [0x00000] in :0 
      at FlightIntegrator.ThermoPrecalculate () [0x00000] in :0 
      at FlightIntegrator.Update () [0x00000] in :0
